EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_7AM Single Page App-Spring Security-AngularJS.Reminder 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Reminder: A Single-Page Application with Spring Security and Angular JS
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, We are looking forward to having you join today's webinar A Single-Page Application with Spring Security and Angular JS with David Syer. If you haven't done so yet, we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, March 10, 2015 Europe: 2:00pm GMT (London, GMT) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e4df61ef88702e1b397c10b2a99f59237> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 669 339 057 Thank you,
